snippet: The chairman of Yum Brands, David C. Novak, 63, will retire in May, ending a three-decade career with the restaurant giant.
abstract: Yum Brands chairman David C Novak, who has held post since 2000, will retire in May.
lead_paragraph: The chairman of Yum Brands, David C. Novak, 63, will retire in May, ending a three-decade career with the restaurant giant.

headline.main: Chairman of Yum Brands to Retire After 3 Decades
headline.print_headline: Chairman of Yum Brands to Retire After 3 Decades
